pathways.name: Peacekeeper
pathways.description: Keeper of the Peace: Starter kit featuring Peacekeeper Armor Set, weapons, UV flares, glowsticks, bandages, and crafting recipes.

pathways.name: Veteran
pathways.description: The Veteran: Includes Tier 1 Military Armor Set, weapons, Molotovs, and bandages.

pathways.name: RoadWarrior
pathways.description: Road Warrior: Features Mixed Renegade and Bandit Armor Set, weapons, Molotovs, bandages, and various potions.

pathways.name: DoomsDayPrepper
pathways.description: The DoomsDay Prepper: Unlocks all skills from the start of the game, includes starting weapons, a custom paraglider, starting cash, potions, crafting items, grenades and other explosives, and crafting mods.
